title: Interpretation of a judge in a dream and seeing a court in a dream

preview.html: The concept of a judge for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, for a married man and a single man, whether he enters the courtroom in the presence of police officers, witnesses, a lawyer, an accused in the case, release or imprisonment and more by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a judge. Whoever sees the judge looks at him with interest and compassion and sympathizes with him. In soft words, its expression is to approach the educated and obtain a high position. And whoever dreams of someone else means despair, want, humiliation, and lack of debts, and it was said: The dream of a famous judge is good and blessed. And whoever sees an unknown judge interprets the Almighty and Most High Creator, and imposes his ruling according to the words of God Almighty: “And God judges.” There is no objection to his ruling.” Ibn Shirin said: Whoever sees that he has become a judge and judge of creation, and is not worthy of it, then he said: If he is not a judge and sees that, harm, affliction, distress, and distress will befall him, and his money and furniture. We will leave. If he is a traveler whose path is interrupted, he will face fatigue and hardship, and his money will be destroyed. And if the sick person sees that the judge has sent him a subpoena, his term may expire. And if the judge sees him sitting next to him or in a high place, this is glory and honor, and perhaps seeing the judge indicates disagreement. And otherwise. Whoever sees a judge with a scale in his hand is judging between creation and reality. Jabir al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees a judge giving a ruling and says it as he saw it. If he sees a judge entering into it, this is glory and the state. Whoever sees in a dream that he committed a crime and then appears before the judge, and is sentenced to imprisonment. In a dream, this indicates difficult or difficult days that the dreamer may soon go through. Whoever sees in his dream that the judge in court orders him to pay alimony to his wife, this could be self-talk if the dreamer is waiting for a decision of this kind. And the woman who sees in her dream That she stands before the judge in a courtroom session and decides to divorce her husband, this indicates that the relationship between them is very close and trusting and that their lives will continue until the end of life with love and tenderness. Whoever sees in his dream that he has become a judge, if he is a merchant, he will achieve destiny and balance. If he sees In a dream that he does not have the right to rule until he rules unjustly among men, then he takes over a matter or a public interest and keeps it for himself, and he may betray trust or deceive a friend. If he is a traveler and sees in his dream that he has assumed judicial authority in the country he is going to, then he will marry people from the people of That state or he takes over their affairs and is right among them. And the judge’s words are the same in the dream as the wise man or the great sheikh. If he sees the scales being weighed before the judge, then he will obtain forgiveness or reward from God. But if he dreams that a judge weighs or weighs money, then this symbolizes the ruler’s bribery and corruption. As for the unknown judge in the dream, he is God Almighty. Whoever dreams that he has become a judge, ruler, sheikh, or jurist, then he occupies a high position among the people, and is affected by many noble deeds. If He saw himself wearing the judge’s dress or dress, or covered with his turban, then he is influenced by power and influence. As for the woman who sees the judge’s face happy and enlightened, if she is unmarried, she will get married. If she is married, then she is promised a livelihood or a child. If she is pregnant, then she will be married.

If He saw himself wearing the judge’s dress or dress, or covered with his turban, then he is influenced by power and influence. As for the woman who sees the judge’s face happy and enlightened, if she is unmarried, she will get married. If she is married, then she is promised a livelihood or a child. If she is pregnant, then she will be married.

title: I dreamed that I hit my ex-wife in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I hit my ex-wife in a dream, we know that you want to know what it holds. I dreamed that I hit my ex-wife in a dream. I dreamed that I hit my ex-wife in a dream, this may indicate the mood of injustice that she faces, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees that her husband The ex is being beaten in a dream, so this may be evidence that she will gain benefit, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees being beaten, she may express her benefit from the beating, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Also, seeing being beaten can indicate kindness and advice, and God knows all What is not seen: Interpretation of a dream of showering in my ex-wife’s house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of showering in my ex-wife’s house in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing showering with your ex-husband in a dream may indicate that the problems have stopped, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, as it may indicate that she is getting rid of the problems with her ex-wife. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Bathing for a divorced woman in a dream can indicate changes in her psychological state, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about an abandoned house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an abandoned house in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing an abandoned house in a dream can be evidence of a lack of interest. With the soul, and God knows the unseen. Seeing an abandoned house in a dream may indicate neglect of some matters on the part of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see an abandoned house burning in a dream, this may indicate that he has abandoned a dangerous matter and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband’s sister in my family’s home In a dream, interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife’s sister in my family’s home. In a dream, seeing my ex-wife’s sister can represent good changes, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s sister in a dream, this may be evidence of her ability to solve problems, and God knows the unseen. When she sees the divorced woman’s sister In a dream, it may be a sign of a return to its application, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband buying me a house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband buying me a house in a dream could indicate stability, God willing. When you see my ex-husband buying a new house in a dream, it may This will be a sign of comfort, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband buying a new house, it may relieve her of sadness, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees herself buying a new house in a dream, this may represent compensation from God, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of my fiancé’s dream of having a child in a dream. Interpretation Dreams about my fiancé having a baby in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, but seeing my fiancé may indicate new job opportunities, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her fiancé in a dream, it may be a sign that she is thinking about him, and God knows the unseen. When you see your fiancé happy in a dream, it could be That is a sign of goodness and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my fiancé sleeping next to me in a dream. title: What is the most accurate interpretation of a dream about someone giving me food in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone giving me food in a dream? Perhaps seeing food or offering food in a dream is one of the visions that carry promising and reassuring warnings to the dreamer that in the coming days there will be a noticeable improvement in all aspects. In a different sense, what matters to us is the meaning of who sees who offers him food. Interpretation of dreams for someone giving me food Eating in a dream symbolizes many things, depending on the type of food. If the food is meat, this indicates abundance in the diet, but it also symbolizes a person who often lies, spoils his reputation, and is characterized by gossip. If the table is made of fruit, it indicates goodness, enjoyment of health, and lawful money, and the fruits differ in moisture and hardness. Earn and spend immediately, while hard fruits symbolize things that last a long time and do not disappear quickly. And if he eats bread, this indicates longevity and an increase in money, especially if the bread is white and black symbolizes sadness and depression. Seeing someone giving me food in a dream symbolizes reaping the fruits and abundance of food and ease of work and profit without much effort, the love that others have for him. Providing you with food may be evidence of an acquired right for you or a service that you provided for free before, and when you face a certain crisis, that service is returned in another form. The weather was hot and this indicates a misplaced effort or eating harmful food provided with forbidden money. And if the dreamer sees that he is providing food to others, this means that he meets the needs and offers a helping hand or the existence of an old vow, as the dream indicates a change in the situation and freedom from problems, obstacles and death. From sorrows, and if he provides food to a hungry man and this man is related to him, this indicates the death of hatred and the death of grace and evil that this man hides for the seer and the desire to taste poverty and disease. If someone offers you food in a dream, this is a sign of things you have been waiting for, the arrival of a certain late message and hearing happy news. If the dreamer drinks from the food offered to him, this indicates the ability to live and prosper, and this vision in general indicates the relationship that connects the dreamer with the person who offers him food and the extent of understanding between them and participation in work and life in general. Ibn Shaheen believes that the food offered in the desert symbolizes travel, travel and change of status. If he shares food with scholars, this indicates that he is seeking knowledge, and is knowledgeable in sciences and arts. If the food is sour, this is a sign of the difficult path that the fortuneteller is walking, the distance of goals from reaching and the obstacles that stand in his way. Eating in a dream indicates a high position and high status. If food is offered at the invitation of someone, this indicates the offers that are presented to the viewer and the many opportunities that, if used correctly, become of great importance. Interpretation of dreams for someone giving me food Interpretation of seeing someone giving me food by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin distinguishes between eating at weddings and

title: What is the interpretation of buying an abaya in a dream and its meaning for good and evil?

preview.html: In this article, we examine for you in detail from the encyclopedia the interpretation of buying an abaya in a dream. The world of dreams contains many mysterious symbols that make the dreamer confused, and also make him curious about the contents of reality, and among these symbols is buying clothes in different shapes for a variety of occasions. Between buying new, clean clothes in good condition, or dirty and in bad condition, as the meanings of the dream vary depending on its condition. Firstly, seeing buying an abaya in a dream is one of the most common visions that women see. What did dream interpreters say about it? This is what you can see in the following lines. Interpretation of buying an abaya in a dream When you dream of buying a new abaya in a dream, the meaning of this dream lies in the good man in the woman’s life, whether he is the dreamer’s fiancé or her husband. In the case of a dream that sees buying a white abaya in a dream, The interpretation of this lies in changing the dreamer’s circumstances for the better, whether on the personal or professional level. If the dreamer sees that she is buying a black abaya in a dream, then this dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams for her, expressing the abundance of her strength. Interpretation of seeing buying an abaya in a dream for a single woman. Seeing buying an abaya New clothes for single women indicate purity and concealment, in addition to the halal diet that the dreamer enjoys. Some jurists have indicated that this vision indicates happy events in the dreamer’s life, represented by engagement or marriage. If a single woman dreams that she is going somewhere to buy a specific abaya This indicates the dreamer’s ability to overcome the obstacles she faces in her life. Buying an abaya in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream especially for a married woman, if she buys a black abaya, this indicates her marriage to a man of good morals. If a married woman sees that she is buying an abaya in... In a dream and she did not wear the abaya at first, the meaning of this dream lies in the fact that she is going through an unpleasant event in reality, and God knows best. In the event that she sees buying a white abaya in a dream, this indicates her good condition and safety, and the vision shows that she will do everything in her power to take responsibility. Her family. Interpretation of a dream about a new abaya for a single woman. Seeing a new abaya in a dream symbolizes purity and justice. It is also a vision promising the arrival of a joyful event for the dreamer, represented by marriage, and God knows best. If you see a new white or black abaya, this dream expresses the abundance of sustenance for the dreamer. Among The commendable symbols of seeing a new abaya in a dream are that it indicates a change in attitude for the better, whether on the emotional or professional level. If an unmarried woman sees herself wearing a new abaya in a dream, this means that the dreamer will pass a new stage in her life. If the new abaya The one that the dreamer wears in a dream is luxurious and elegant, this indicates her good status. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is wearing an ugly and old abaya, this is a sign of shortcomings in obedience to God and many problems in the dreamer’s life. Mother

title: Interpretation of a dream about dates by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: A date in a dream. It indicates the good psychological state in which the fortuneteller is. Wet dates on the tree. Ingredients for happiness and good days. Eating dates in a dream. It indicates profit and a lot of money that will be gained. Dates buried in the ground. A guide to saving money. Eating red dates for a married woman. It indicates a happy life that she will live. Seeing a date in a dream for a single woman. The unmarried girl will be freed from the narrow livelihood and will enjoy riches and wealth. Distributing dates in a dream states that the dreamer has a good personality who loves goodness and helps others. Show it. Black dates in a dream are evidence of many fears, problems, and issues present in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about dates by Ibn Sirin. Vision. Wet dates on trees are a sign of happiness and good days. Dates in a dream show the good psychological state that the dreamer is in. Seeing date palms in a dream is a sign of wealth that the dreamer has acquired. Eating dates in a dream indicates a lot of profits and money that you will get from A successful project. Dating in a dream is a sign of rain. If someone sees in a dream that he is taking dates from another person, this indicates an extensive diet. Dates buried in the ground when seen in a dream, this is evidence of saving money. Interpretation of a dream about dating For a manIf a man sees a date in a dream during his time, this indicates his marriage to an honorable girl with good character. A date in a dream for a man shows a lot of money. If one sees in his dream that he is hitting a date tree, he will travel to earn money. Red dates in a dream indicate livelihood Which the dreamer will receive.Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream according to Al-NabulsiDates in a dream, as interpreted by Al-Nabulsi, indicate halal money.Dating in a dream indicates freedom from anxiety and freedom from anxiety.See the dates above.TreesBe an indicator of happiness and get rid of anxiety and stress.Drinking the rotten Red Sea Evidence of diseases that have afflicted the fortuneteller. Dates are a sign of great wealth that the dreamer will acquire. Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream eating red dates and it was at the appointed time, this indicates a happy life that she will live. Buying dates from the market is evidence of The money that a woman gets and her husband’s livelihood. Stealing dates in a dream for a married woman indicates the problems that she will face in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream for a pregnant woman Food Dates in a pregnant woman’s dream are evidence of her feeding a male child. Harvesting dates in a pregnancy dream is evidence of kindness and ease of childbirth. Vision A pregnant woman in a dream eats dates out of season, and this indicates the approaching date of giving birth. Interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman. It is an interpretation of seeing a date dream for single women. It is a positive interpretation of the life of an unmarried girl and you will notice her after the dream. The unmarried girl will be freed from the narrowness of livelihood, and will be rich and wealthy, And be wise and have an influential personality. If you are...

Vision A pregnant woman in a dream eats dates out of season, and this indicates the approaching date of giving birth. Interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman. It is an interpretation of seeing a date dream for single women. It is a positive interpretation of the life of an unmarried girl and you will notice her after the dream. The unmarried girl will be freed from the narrowness of livelihood, and will be rich and wealthy, And be wise and have an influential personality. If you are...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of an incomplete child by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of giving birth is one of the most common dreams among women, and a man can also see in his dream a dream of giving birth to a child. Therefore, he evaluated the site. A different interpretation of the dream of giving birth to an incomplete child, with clarification of the different interpretations of the dream of birth. Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to an incomplete child. Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to an incomplete child, according to leading interpreters, indicates the incompleteness of the goal that the dreamer seeks to achieve, and that he will go through some fluctuations that prevent him. To achieve what he aspires to. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is giving birth to an underdeveloped child, then this dream means that her marriage will be delayed. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an incomplete child for a married woman indicates that she will give birth to a boy with bad character and who is unfair to his parents. If a man sees a dream about giving birth to an incomplete child, this means that His happiness will not be complete, as some interpreters indicated that the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer will be exposed to extreme poverty, but he will. Blessed with children or money but not blessed with offspring. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a child from the mouthAfter considering the interpretation of the dream about the birth of an incomplete child, depending on the social status of the fortuneteller, it should be noted that the dream about the birth of a child from the mouth The mouth is one of the most hated dreams, because it indicates life disturbances that happen to the viewer. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is giving birth to a child through the mouth, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to a serious illness that may lead to her death. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth to a child through the mouth . She must take care of her health and follow a specialist doctor. Because in this dream it is a sign of the danger that you will be exposed to during pregnancy and childbirth. When a man sees a dream of giving birth to a child from his mouth, this indicates that he will try to escape from a woman who wants to betray him. Interpretation of the dream of giving birth to a child with special needs. A large number of interpreters said that A dream about the birth of a disabled child is similar to the interpretation of a dream about the birth of an incomplete child, as both dreams do not contain anything good. Seeing the birth of a disabled child in a couple’s dream indicates separation between them as a result of the betrayal of one of the spouses. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a small child Some contemporary interpreters believe that the dream of a child being born small To the point that he will not be able to live indicates that the dreamer will make some wrong decisions that will bring him many problems. If the size of the small child does not indicate that he will be in danger of death, it means that the fortuneteller will be exposed to a problem that requires the exercise of logic and wisdom in order for him to overcome it. Dreaming of giving birth to a small child also expresses a lack of hands. Something that requires work to raise the economic level. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a child with a large head. Seeing a dream about the birth of a child with a large head means that the dreamer possesses wisdom and a sound mind. This vision is one of the most benign visions that indicates the dreamer’s ability to bear responsibilities and burdens. If a pregnant woman sees the birth of a child with a large head, this indicates that this child will be a prominent figure in society and will be able to raise the status of his family. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wind in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing wind coming out in a dream, signs of wind coming out of the anus in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman and a man, the meaning of gas coming out, seeing passing wind, farts, a symbol of wind rising from the dead, interpretation of wind coming during prayer, leaving Fart is what humans and animals do to expel intestinal gases from the anus. When we see it in a dream, we are very confused in its interpretation, and therefore we will find out today through the interpretation of seeing wind coming out in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream of wind coming out in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of seeing wind coming out in a dream As the distinguished researcher Ibn Sirin explained, it indicates the ugliness of speech, insults, and contempt for others. Dreaming of wind coming out of the anus in a dream is evidence of many fears, sorrows, and falling into a problem that is difficult to get out of. Seeing the wind blowing among people in a dream means that you are going through a psychological state. Bad, and the situation changes to bad luck. Seeing the wind letting go in a dream involuntarily means comfort, removing fears and sorrows, alleviating troubles and paying off debts. The dream that sees the wind being blown intentionally in a dream is evidence that we lie, defame oneself, and commit theft and gossip. Interpretation of a dream The wind blowing for a single woman: A dream interpretation of the wind blowing in a dream for a single woman can indicate the death of her anxiety, an improvement in her mood, and comfort for herself. Seeing the wind coming out of the anus among a group of people in a dream for unmarried women is evidence of committing many sins and immoral behavior. Dreaming of wind blowing strongly in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of a bad biography and scandal. People talk about that as long as this sound is like seeing the wind blowing without a sound in an unmarried woman’s dream. It shows that she will have a failed emotional relationship with a person who does not suit her and will exploit her feelings. A dream about seeing gases that arise during defecation in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the end of problems, changing her life for the better, and getting what she wants. Interpretation of a dream about the wind blowing for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing the wind emitting a foul odor in a dream for a married woman is an ominous sign for her. It is Evidence of bad reputation and frequent scandals among people. Seeing wind coming from a person to a married woman is a sign of kindness, the presence of huge means of livelihood, the disappearance of fears, and the disappearance of sorrows. A dream about a husband leaving gas in a married woman’s dream indicates desirable visions, because it is evidence of paying off debts. , short-term relief, and satisfaction of needs. Seeing a loud noise in a married woman’s dream is evidence of a major disaster for her and her family, and it will be difficult for her to get out. A dream about seeing wind coming out of the anus in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has been severely insulted by someone close to her. Interpretation of a dream about the wind blowing for a pregnant woman: A dream about wind coming out of the vagina in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her due date is approaching, and she will be relieved from the pain and problems of pregnancy. Seeing the wind blowing involuntarily.

title: Interpretation of a dream about peeling a banana in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about peeling a banana in a dream. After that, we will provide interpretations for everyone mentioned in the vision by the greatest dream interpreters, with regard to the interpretation of a dream about peeling a banana in a dream and the rest.. Interpretation of a dream about peeling a banana in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about peeling a banana in a dream can be a sign of strength. Violence is from man, and God knows best. When a single girl sees a peeled banana, this can lead to a violent and strong love story, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself peeling a banana in a dream, this may be evidence of success, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing a banana peeled can indicate Also to goodness and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a rotten banana. Interpretation of a dream about a rotten banana in a dream could be a sign of a bad reputation, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a man sees a banana as a rotten banana, it may be a sign of badness, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When you see a rotten banana, this indicates Losing it, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a rotten banana in a dream, this may be an indication of a job that he does not like, but he does it compulsively, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about someone eating bananas in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone eating bananas in a dream. Eating bananas can indicate goodness and care, God willing. In the event that a married woman is seen eating bananas, this may lead to healing, and God knows the unseen. Seeing someone eating bananas may indicate commitment to duties and acts of worship, and God Almighty is above all things. If a young man is seen eating bananas, this indicates goodness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about picking berries from a tree. Tree in a dream The interpretation of a dream about picking berries from a tree in a dream could be a sign of affection, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing a mulberry tree also represents a rich wife and a person of honorable lineage, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a mulberry tree, it may be a sign of money and livelihood, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a mulberry tree, it may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating red berries in a dream. The interpretation of a dream that you are eating red berries in a dream could be an indication of your need to be patient, and God knows the unseen, as red berries may indicate that he warns the dreamer of Anger, he controls it, and he loves it calmly, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing an unmarried girl with red berries may indicate her marriage to a rich person, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about buying pomegranates in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about buying pomegranates in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees buying Pomegranates can lead to a lawful life, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a young man is seen buying sweet pomegranates, it may be wealth, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman dreams of buying pomegranates, this may indicate sincere repentance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating pomegranates in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Eating pomegranates in a dream can be a sign of nourishment, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, as it can express obtaining a lot of money, and God knows the unseen, in the case of a woman watching

title: Interpretation of shaving hair in a dream

preview.html: We present the interpretation of shaving hair in a dream in all the details and situations that can be seen through the Encyclopedia website. They are among the visions that often make the dreamer feel distressed, anxious, and disturbed, as the dream world represents an important topic that is closely linked to what is coming. His life is a life of loss and sadness, as it involves the loss of something dear to him, which is his hair, the crown of his head, and one of the symbols of beauty for everyone. Shaving is usually for men and not for women, but dreams have no restrictions and always contradict the usual, and no one has found an explanation for that. But prominent scholars such as Ibn Sirin made a great effort to put a meaning to everything. One can see it during his sleep and in their approach. We will clarify the interpretations of this dream for single men, married men, and we will also show the meaning of seeing children shaving their hair. Follow us. Interpretation of shaving hair in a dream. Show in the following paragraph what the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin said about this vision: Despite the belief that this dream It indicates sadness, but it nevertheless indicates that worries and problems will stop and the situation will change for the better than it was before. Shaving the hair of the head to perform the Hajj rituals indicates performing the duty and obtaining goodness. Seeing the dreamer shaving his head alone means that he will be promoted in a job or that he will receive On a source of livelihood from which he makes a lawful profit that God has blessed. Shaving a woman’s head is a bad omen regarding serious disputes between her and her husband that may not have serious consequences, and God knows best. This dream indicates the annulment of the contract, relief from distress, and the end of troubles. Whereas whoever has a status Great in his work or rich and has a lot of money and possessions, unlike the above, this dream means goodness and food, but in this case it shows poverty, loss, and the destruction of money, the kingdom. And status, may God protect us. Interpretation of a dream about shaving hair for a single woman. In the following points we present to you evidence of the existence of a single woman who saw her hair being shaved in a dream: This dream indicates that he may be exposed to some health problems or that he will suffer from some disease, but he recovers quickly, thanks to God. Sometimes It symbolizes the loss of a person dear to her heart, and God knows best. It can also appear that he has great ambitions and many dreams, but is unable to achieve them. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a married woman’s hair. The following is the interpretation of a married woman’s dream of shaving her hair in a dream: Seeing a married woman shaving her hair symbolizes To menopause and the end of the ability to reproduce, in contrast to seeing long hair, which indicates childbearing and imminent pregnancy. The fact that a married woman shaves her hair indicates how close she is to God Almighty, her piety, and her desire to perform duties and worship in their appointed times. Seeing her shaving the hair of the body, not the head Evidence of the nourishment blessed in it and the goodness that she will receive later in her life. The husband shaving his wife’s hair symbolizes sharp disagreements between them and constant quarrels. Interpretation of a dream about shaving hair for a married man. The interpretation of shaving hair in a dream depends on the man himself and whether he shaves the hair he loves, or if he Preferably a

title: Interpretation of stars in a dream: Seeing meteors in a dream

preview.html: A dream about the stars for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a man, or seeing meteors falling from the sky, and meteors falling to the ground, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq. The interpretation of seeing stars in a dream depends on the condition of the dreamer, whether they fell on them, flew on them, or lit up, whether in his home or elsewhere, and is proportional to his condition, whether he is a man or a woman. Pregnant, single or married, and we will mainly take the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and some of them such as Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi and others. Ibn Sirin explained in a dream that it can indicate happiness and goodness and it can vary according to the condition and gender of the viewer, whether male or female. Seeing stars sparkling in the sky for women can mean that they are decorations that women adorn. Interpretation of a dream about stars: Seeing stars in a dream indicates fame and the acquisition of abundant money that a woman enjoys in her life, and distant and bright stars may indicate scholars and the best and truest people, and stars sometimes when they are present in them. Heaven may refer to traveling and preaching to get from one place to another. Immigration to another country, and it may have a separate interpretation depending on the fact that the man only marries a virgin and sane woman and that his children are male. The translator Ibn Sirin says that seeing stars falling from the sky in a place known to the pioneer, then a fatal illness or death will occur in that place, If it falls into the sea, this is death for travelers through a great storm. A boat or a raging sea kills a lot of people, like seeing them falling and burning people, it is a contagious disease that spreads in the place where it fell, but if it fell in a place that the dreamer does not know and does not infect people, then it indicates that people are close to death and the torment of life, but After that there will be only a few victims. As for whoever dreams that the stars belong to him, or they become his property, or he puts them in his pocket or on his lap, then he will rise in prestige and glory among men, and whoever dreams that he is a shepherd who looks after the stars or looks after the stars. The order of those in Paradise, so he will rise to a high rank, if he qualifies for it, if he is a judge or judge among men or close to ruling, and if he is from the common people, then he learns astronomy. And the stars, or astrology and magic. In the event that the stars are seen in his house or in his house, twinkling in it or sparkling in it, it relieves the distress or pleasure and happiness of entering that house, and it is said that it is meeting the shining ones from his neighborhood. And his place and his notables in his house are happy, and if it is not illuminated in his house and his light does not shine, then it indicates that notables and people will meet with a disaster in his house or a funeral place. And when a person sees that the stars fall on his head in his dream, then he will fall ill and die from this disease, and if he has People ask him for money and he cannot pay it, so he suffers hardship or imprisonment. In his country, he is afflicted with distress or illness, and the star falling on the pregnant woman’s head indicates that she is pregnant with a child in her womb, and she will give birth to him in good health, and she will have a good intercessor. A decent life among men and his family, but if the star occurs with the death of a pregnant woman or a witness who fears death, then...

Heaven may refer to traveling and preaching to get from one place to another. Immigration to another country, and it may have a separate interpretation depending on the fact that the man only marries a virgin and sane woman and that his children are male. The translator Ibn Sirin says that seeing stars falling from the sky in a place known to the pioneer, then a fatal illness or death will occur in that place, If it falls into the sea, this is death for travelers through a great storm. A boat or a raging sea kills a lot of people, like seeing them falling and burning people, it is a contagious disease that spreads in the place where it fell, but if it fell in a place that the dreamer does not know and does not infect people, then it indicates that people are close to death and the torment of life, but After that there will be only a few victims. As for whoever dreams that the stars belong to him, or they become his property, or he puts them in his pocket or on his lap, then he will rise in prestige and glory among men, and whoever dreams that he is a shepherd who looks after the stars or looks after the stars. The order of those in Paradise, so he will rise to a high rank, if he qualifies for it, if he is a judge or judge among men or close to ruling, and if he is from the common people, then he learns astronomy. And the stars, or astrology and magic. In the event that the stars are seen in his house or in his house, twinkling in it or sparkling in it, it relieves the distress or pleasure and happiness of entering that house, and it is said that it is meeting the shining ones from his neighborhood. And his place and his notables in his house are happy, and if it is not illuminated in his house and his light does not shine, then it indicates that notables and people will meet with a disaster in his house or a funeral place. And when a person sees that the stars fall on his head in his dream, then he will fall ill and die from this disease, and if he has People ask him for money and he cannot pay it, so he suffers hardship or imprisonment. In his country, he is afflicted with distress or illness, and the star falling on the pregnant woman’s head indicates that she is pregnant with a child in her womb, and she will give birth to him in good health, and she will have a good intercessor. A decent life among men and his family, but if the star occurs with the death of a pregnant woman or a witness who fears death, then...
